A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Just a warning\, spoilers ahead. It was a really interesting movie\, and it really had some twists. It made you think it would go like Empire Strikes Back\, but then has a drastic change. I also have quite a bit of bias for it\, due to the return of everyone's favourite force sensitive Muppet. An overall good movie\, with a perfect sendoff for Luke.
